intro: The Phaeton Taghmata operates out the Orthodox Forge World Phaeton in the Segmentum Solar, with an emphasis on Armoured formations. Its armies gain 12 formation points (F/p), 14 upgrade points (U/p), 4 Titan points (T/p), and 4 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Taghmata Omnissiah armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: Legiones Astartes Allied Detachments, Collegia Titanica Allied Banners, and Centurio Ordinatus Constructs have an Initiative Rating of 1+. Phaeton Taghmata Maniples have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and are subject to the 'Logic of Victory' special rule. Legio Cybernetica Maniples have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Cybernetica Cortex' special rule. Solar Auxilia Allied Sections have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Questoris Familia Lances have an Initiative Rating of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule.

sections.name: Phaeton Taghmata Core Maniples
sections.description: May only have one Thallax or Castellax Maniple for each Adsecularis or Mechanized Adsecularis Maniple

formations.name: Adsecularis Maniple
formations.units: One Tech-Priest Auxilia, five Adsecularis Tech-Thrall Cohorts
extraUnits: Replace the Tech-Priest Auxilia with an Archmagos on Abeyant: 1 U/p
Replace the Tech-Priest Auxilia with an Archmagos Prime on Abeyant: 2 U/p (0-1 in army)
Add five Adsecularis Tech-Thrall Cohorts: 3 U/p
Add two Castellax Battle-Automata Cohorts: 2 U/p
Add two Myrmidon Secutor Hosts: 2 U/p

formations.name: Mechanized Adsecularis Maniple
formations.units: Four Adsecularis Tech-Thrall Cohorts, one Taghmata Triaros Armoured Conveyor
extraUnits: Add up to two Thallax Cohorts: 1 U/p each
Add up to two Ursarax Cohorts: 1 U/p each
Add up to two Vorax Battle-Automata: 1 U/p each
Add up to two Thagmata Leman Russ of any configuration: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Thallax Maniple
formations.units: Four Thallax Cohorts
extraUnits: Add up to two Ursarax Cohorts: 1 U/p each
Add up to two Vorax Battle-Automata: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Castellax Maniple
formations.units: Four Castellax Battle-Automata Cohorts

sections.name: Phaeton Taghmata Special Maniples
sections.description: May only have one Special Maniple for each Core Maniple

formations.name: Vultarax Stratos Maniple
formations.units: Four Vultarax Stratos-Automata

formations.name: Thanatar Siege Maniple
formations.units: Four Thanatar Siege-Automata

formations.name: Domitar Battle Maniple
formations.units: Four Domitar Battle-Automata

formations.name: Myridon Maniple
formations.units: Four Myridon Destructors
extraUnits: Add up to two Arlatax Battle-Automata: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Karacnos Maniple
formations.units: One Cortex Controller character, three Karacnos Assault Tanks
extraUnits: Add one Karacnos Assault Tank: 1 U/p

formations.name: Taghmata Leman Russ Squadron
formations.units: One Cortex Controller character, three Taghmata Leman Russ of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Taghmata Leman Russ of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Krios Maniple
formations.units: One Cortex Controller character, three Krios Battle Tanks of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Krios Battle Tank of any configuration: 1 U/p

sections.name: Phaeton Taghmata Elite Maniple
sections.description: May only have one Elite Section for each two Core Sections

formations.name: Armiger Moirax Lance
formations.units: Three Armiger Moirax of any configuration

formations.name: Mechanicum Cerastus Lance
formations.units: Two Cerastus Atrapos

formations.name: Mechanicum Questoris Lance
formations.units: Two Mechanicum Questoris of any configuration

formations.name: Taghmata Leman Russ Company
formations.units: One Cortex Controller, eight Taghmata Leman Russ of any configuration

formations.name: Mechanicum Acastus Lance
formations.units: One Mechanicum Acastus of any configuration

sections.name: Imperial Navy Squadrons
sections.description: May only have one Navy Squadron for each two Core or Special Sections

formations.name: Avenger Squadron
formations.units: Two Avenger Strike Fighters

formations.name: Lightning Squadron
formations.units: Two Lightning Interceptors
extraUnits: Add one Lightning Interceptor: 1 U/p

sections.name: Solar Auxilia Allied Sections
sections.description: The first formation selected must be an Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio

formations.name: Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio
formations.units: One Auxilia Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or two Veletarii, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p

formations.name: Ogryn Charonite Section
formations.units: Three Charonite Ogryns
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, or two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or two Veletarii: 1 U/p

formations.name: Veletaris Storm Section
formations.units: Four Veletarii
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Heavy Sentinel Patrol
formations.units: Four Aethon Heavy Sentinels

formations.name: Auxilia Artillery Battery
formations.units: Three Basilisk and/or Medusa
extraUnits: Add one Basilisk and/or Medusa: 1 U/p

sections.name: Centurio Ordinatus Allied Constructs
sections.description: May not have more than one of each configuration of Ordinatus Construct in the army

formations.name: Minoris Battle Construct
formations.units: One Ordinatus Minoris Battle Construct of any configuration. Each configuration is 0-1 in the army.

formations.name: Minoris Support Construct
formations.units: One Ordinatus Minoris Support Construct of any configuration. Each configuration is 0-1 in the army.

formations.name: Majoris Construct
formations.units: One Ordinatus Majoris Heavy Siege Construct of any configuration. Each configuration is 0-1 in the army.

sections.name: Legiones Astartes Allied Detachments
sections.description: The first formation selected must be a Tactical Detachment

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Tactical Legionaries
extraUnits: Replace up to two Legion Tactical Squads with two Legion Support Squads (1 U/p), two Legion Heavy Support Squads (2 U/p), or two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any single configuration (2 U/p)

formations.name: Land Speeder Detachment
formations.units: Three Proteus Land Speeders or Javelin Attack Speeders of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Proteus Land Speeder or Javelin Attack Speeder of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Predator Detachment
formations.units: Three Predators of any configuration

formations.name: Sicarian Detachment
formations.units: Two Sicarians of any configuration
